mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho" ON "DbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" ON "DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho" ON "DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5116IchijiHanteiKekkaJoho" ON "DbT5116IchijiHanteiKekkaJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5120ShinseitodokedeJoho" ON "DbT5120ShinseitodokedeJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM rgdb."DbT5150RenrakusakiJoho" AS "mst" WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM rgdb."DbT5150RenrakusakiJoho" AS "slv" WHERE "mst"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "slv"."shinseishoKanriNo" AND "mst".priority > "slv".priority ) ) AS "DbT5150RenrakusakiJoho" ON "DbT5150RenrakusakiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM rgdb."DbT5202NinteichosahyoGaikyoChosa" AS "mst" WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM rgdb."DbT5202NinteichosahyoGaikyoChosa" AS "slv" WHERE "mst"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "slv"."shinseishoKanriNo" AND "mst"."ninteichosaRirekiNo" < "slv"."ninteichosaRirekiNo" ) ) AS "DbT5202NinteichosahyoGaikyoChosa" ON "DbT5202NinteichosahyoGaikyoChosa"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM rgdb."DbT5203NinteichosahyoKihonChosa" AS "mst" WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM rgdb."DbT5203NinteichosahyoKihonChosa" AS "slv" WHERE "mst"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "slv"."shinseishoKanriNo" AND "mst"."ninteichosaRirekiNo" < "slv"."ninteichosaRirekiNo" ) ) AS "DbT5203NinteichosahyoKihonChosa" ON "DbT5203NinteichosahyoKihonChosa"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM rgdb."DbT5302ShujiiIkenshoJoho" AS "mst" WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM rgdb."DbT5302ShujiiIkenshoJoho" AS "slv" WHERE "mst"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "slv"."shinseishoKanriNo" AND "mst"."ikenshoIraiRirekiNo" < "slv"."ikenshoIraiRirekiNo" ) ) AS "DbT5302ShujiiIkenshoJoho" ON "DbT5302ShujiiIkenshoJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo"
LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5510IchiGojiHanteiKekkaJoho" ON "DbT5510IchiGojiHanteiKekkaJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" ON "DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5501ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho" ON "DbT5501ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho"."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = "DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho"."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho" ON "DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho"."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = "DbT5501ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho"."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT7211GaibuRenkeiDataoutputJoho" ON "DbT7211GaibuRenkeiDataoutputJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5911ShujiiIryoKikanJoho" ON "DbT5911ShujiiIryoKikanJoho"."shujiiIryokikanCode" = "DbT5302ShujiiIkenshoJoho"."shujiiIryokikanCode" AND "DbT5911ShujiiIryoKikanJoho"."shichosonCode" = "DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster"."shichosonCode" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5912ShujiiJoho" ON "DbT5912ShujiiJoho"."shujiiIryokikanCode" = "DbT5302ShujiiIkenshoJoho"."shujiiIryoKikanCode" AND "DbT5912ShujiiJoho"."shujiiCode" = "DbT5302ShujiiIkenshoJoho"."shujiiCode" AND "DbT5912ShujiiJoho"."shichosonCode" = "DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster"."shichosonCode" WHERE "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" IN
#{申請書管理番号}
ORDER BY "DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster"."shichosonCode", "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."hihokenshaNo", "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."ninteiShinseiYMD" DESC

SELECT * FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" ON "DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5301ShujiiIkenshoIraiJoho" ON "DbT5301ShujiiIkenshoIraiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM rgdb."DbT5302ShujiiIkenshoJoho" AS "mst" WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM rgdb."DbT5302ShujiiIkenshoJoho" AS "slv" WHERE "mst"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "slv"."shinseishoKanriNo" AND "mst"."ikenshoIraiRirekiNo" < "slv"."ikenshoIraiRirekiNo" ) ) AS "DbT5302ShujiiIkenshoJoho" ON "DbT5302ShujiiIkenshoJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5303ShujiiIkenshoKinyuItem" ON "DbT5303ShujiiIkenshoKinyuItem"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo"
WHERE "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" IN
#{申請書管理番号}
ORDER BY "DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster"."shichosonCode", "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."hihokenshaNo", "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."ninteiShinseiYMD" DESC

select.id: select認定調査票サービスの状況

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5207NinteichosahyoServiceJokyo" ON "DbT5207NinteichosahyoServiceJokyo"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" AND "DbT5207NinteichosahyoServiceJokyo"."ninteichosaRirekiNo" = (SELECT MAX(DbT5207Nintei."ninteichosaRirekiNo") FROM rgdb."DbT5207NinteichosahyoServiceJokyo" AS DbT5207Nintei WHERE DbT5207Nintei."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo") WHERE "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = #{申請書管理番号} ORDER BY "DbT5207NinteichosahyoServiceJokyo"."remban"

select.id: select認定調査票サービスの状況フラグ

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5208NinteichosahyoServiceJokyoFlag" ON "DbT5208NinteichosahyoServiceJokyoFlag"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" AND "DbT5208NinteichosahyoServiceJokyoFlag"."ninteichosaRirekiNo"=(SELECT MAX(DbT5208Nintei."ninteichosaRirekiNo") FROM rgdb."DbT5208NinteichosahyoServiceJokyoFlag" AS DbT5208Nintei WHERE DbT5208Nintei."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo") WHERE "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = #{申請書管理番号} ORDER BY "DbT5208NinteichosahyoServiceJokyoFlag"."remban"

SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5209NinteichosahyoKinyuItem" ON "DbT5209NinteichosahyoKinyuItem"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" AND "DbT5209NinteichosahyoKinyuItem"."ninteichosaRirekiNo" = (SELECT MAX(DbT5209Nintei."ninteichosaRirekiNo") FROM rgdb."DbT5209NinteichosahyoKinyuItem" AS DbT5209Nintei WHERE DbT5209Nintei."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo") WHERE "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = #{申請書管理番号} ORDER BY "DbT5209NinteichosahyoKinyuItem"."remban"

SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5210NinteichosahyoShisetsuRiyo" ON "DbT5210NinteichosahyoShisetsuRiyo"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" AND "DbT5210NinteichosahyoShisetsuRiyo"."ninteichosaRirekiNo" = (SELECT MAX(DbT5210Nintei."ninteichosaRirekiNo") FROM rgdb."DbT5210NinteichosahyoShisetsuRiyo" AS DbT5210Nintei WHERE DbT5210Nintei."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo") WHERE "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = #{申請書管理番号} ORDER BY DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem."remban"

SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho" ON "DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem" ON "DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" AND "DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem"."ninteichosaRirekiNo" = (SELECT MAX(DbT5211Nintei."ninteichosaRirekiNo") FROM rgdb."DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem" AS DbT5211Nintei WHERE DbT5211Nintei."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo") WHERE "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = #{申請書管理番号} ORDER BY DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem."remban"

select.id: select要介護認定主治医意見書意見項目

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho" ON "DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem" ON "DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" AND "DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem"."ikenshoIraiRirekiNo" = (SELECT MAX(DbT5304Shujii."ikenshoIraiRirekiNo") FROM rgdb."DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem" AS DbT5304Shujii WHERE DbT5304Shujii."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo") WHERE "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = #{申請書管理番号} ORDER BY "DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem"."remban"
